scripts.start: npm run rebuild && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.start:webpack: npm run rebuild:webpack && pm2 start ecosystem.webpack.config.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.dev.config.js
scripts.stop: npm run clean-build && npm run clean-bundle && pm2 delete ecosystem.config.js && pm2 delete ecosystem.dev.config.js && pm2 delete ecosystem.webpack.config.js
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:webpack: npm run compile && npm run webpack:server && npm run webpack:cacheServer && npm run copy-assets-webpack && npm run clean-build
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean-build && npm run build
scripts.rebuild:webpack: npm run clean-build && npm run clean-bundle && npm run build:webpack
scripts.copy-assets: shx cp -R ./src/server/app/public ./build/server/app && shx cp -R ./src/server/app/views ./build/server/app && shx cp -R ./environment.config ./build
scripts.copy-assets-webpack: shx cp -R ./src/server/app/public ./bundle && shx cp -R ./src/server/app/views ./bundle && shx cp -R ./environment.config ./bundle
